settings.newsletter_richtext: Subscribe to get weekly deals right to your inbox, plus contests & exclusive offers

settings.title: About Us
settings.text:
Golf Vault was founded in 2012 by PGA of Canada member Dave Roy.  In the beginning, a desire for some added income and something more to do in the winter, lead to listing an Odyssey PT 82 Phil Mickelson putter on eBay.  After a successful first sale, the company was on its way to being one of Canada’s top e-commerce golf stores.  We now offer top products from popular brands such as Footjoy, Cobra, Callaway, Taylormade, Titleist, Mizuno & more.  We still sell on eBay and have many products on Amazon.

At the begginning of 2022, we opened a physical retail store in Kitchener, Ontario. We wanted to provide a space for our customers to come and see our products and offer a chance for them to ask us questions. Within the store, we have a simulator bay powered by Trackman Technology where we conduct club fittings, golf lessons, and personal practice sessions. These one on one fittings and lessons are taught by PGA of Canada Members Jack McCarthy and Dave Roy.

Our goal is to provide our customers with exceptional customer service, unbeatable prices, a quick and easy shopping experience, super-fast shipping and helpful after-purchase support.  We help with any issues that arise, including manufacturer’s warranties.

settings.title: ALL 2022 Demo Drivers & Fairway Woods Marked Down
settings.subtitle: Shop gently-used demo clubs from top brands like Callaway, Cobra, TaylorMade, Titleist, Mizuno, Srixon and Wilson!

settings.title: Private Golf Instruction
settings.text: Working with one our PGA of Canada Professionals you can develop a plan to reach your goals. Whether you are looking for a single lesson to check on fundamentals or looking to reduce your handicap over the course of a season, we will work with you to ensure you get the most out of your time.

settings.title:
Jack McCarthy
PGA of Canada Professional
settings.text:
Jack started in the golf industry in 2013. The following year he decided the turn his passion into a full time career, joining the PGA of Canada. Jack is now a Class A Professional and has been a full time instructor over the past 5 years. Over this time period, Jack has worked with golfers of all ages and abilities. No matter your skill level, Jack looks forward to working with you to develop a plan that brings your game to its full potential.

Should you have any questions, please contact Jack at golfpro@golfvault.com

settings.title:
Dave Roy
PGA of Canada Head Professional
settings.text: Dave has 20+ years of teaching experience and is very passionate about the swing and body. He has been taught by, and has learned from some of the most famous instructors in Canada. He is a certified golf fitness instructor and focuses on how students can move effectively and efficiently, based on their bodies capabilities.

settings.title: What's Included In Your Lesson
settings.text:
Instruction by a PGA of Canada Professional

TrackMan Performance Studio using shot analysis

Video analysis (TrackMan or Hudl)

TrackMan Report (Ball and Club data)

Video review or TrackMan screencast for a lesson overview

55-minute session

settings.title: Club Fitting
settings.subtitle: Let us put the right club in your hands

settings.title: Wedge Fitting - $80 (1 Hour)
settings.text:
Proper distance gapping

Determining lofts and grind options that suit your game

Brands offered - Titleist (Vokey), TaylorMade, Callaway, Cobra, Cleveland

settings.title: The Club Fitting Experience
settings.text:
At Golf Vault our goal is to provide customers with an exceptional experience through outstanding customer service, unbeatable prices, an enjoyable shopping experience and helpful after-purchase support. 

Within our indoor fitting studio, we use TrackMan 4 along side Titleist RCT premium golf balls to ensure the data collected during your fitting is both reliable and accurate. This data combined with expert product knowledge allows our professional fitting team to make the perfect addition to your bag. We want to ensure more golfers can experience the benefits club fitting has to offer. Any product purchased following a fitting session will be eligible for a discount.

Golfers will have the option of using Titleist Pro-V1 or Pro-V1x RCT golf balls during their fitting. This premium golf ball option was designed by Titleist and TrackMan to ensure the accuracy of the data captured.

For all fittings, please be sure to bring your current equipment for a side-by-side comparison. Every fitting session will be followed up with a TrackMan report.

settings.title: Driver Fitting - $80 (1 Hour)
settings.text:
Optimizing ball speed, launch, spin and distance for your best driving performance

Brands offered – Titleist, TaylorMade, Callaway, Cobra, Srixon*, Ping-RH only

settings.title: Full Bag Fitting - $160 (2 Hours)
settings.text:
Driver to most lofted wedge

13 Clubs

Please, contact Jack at golfpro@golfvault.com if you have any questions or require more information regarding a fitting.

* Indicates there are limited options available

settings.title: Iron Fitting - $80 (1 Hour)
settings.text:
Finding the best option to maximize your iron game while creating a set that flows from the long game and into the short game

Brands offered - Titleist*, TaylorMade, Ping, Callaway, Cobra, Mizuno, Srixon

settings.title: Fairway/Hybrid Fitting - $80 (1 Hour)
settings.text:
Proper set composition to ensure there are no gaps between your driver and your longest iron

Brands offered - Titleist, TaylorMade, Callaway, Cobra, Srixon*, Ping*

settings.title:
Jack McCarthy

settings.title: Come Visit Us At Our Store
settings.text: Come visit us in store at our new location. You can find us at 2631 Kingsway Drive, Kitchener, ON, N2C 1A7. If you have any issues finding our store just call us at 519-748-1444.
If you have any questions regarding a practice session in the TrackMan Studio, please contact Jack at golfpro@golfvault.com

settings.title: TrackMan Combine
settings.text:
The TrackMan Combine is a standardized test that enables you to identify the strengths and weaknesses in your golf game. Beginning with partial wedge shots and working all the way back to full drives, this 60 shot test will take approximately 30 to 45 minutes to complete.

You can challenge yourself, friends or golfers all around the world (indoor leaderboard). You can even see how your game stacks up against professionals. Or, the test itself can function solely as a practice tool with no requirements to post your scores online.

Test Yardages: 60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 120, 140, 160, 180, driver

settings.title: Work On Your Game In Our TrackMan Studio
settings.text:
Using the TrackMan Performance Studio, you can greatly enhance the way you practice. Use industry leading technology to produce both reliable and accurate data. When you arrive, the studio will be set up and ready to go. An account will be created for you where data across multiple practice sessions can be stored. A staff member will always be available to help navigate through the system.

All practice sessions are 55 minutes.

settings.title: TrackMan Performance Studio
settings.text:
Shot Analysis – open practice range with ball and club data

Optimizer – determine what you need to improve to produce optimal number with each club

Target Range – practice range with targets at varying distances

Test Center – create specific drills tailored to your game

TrackMan Report – a useful tool to look back at all the data from your session

Virtual Golf – an immersive experience playing some of the most notable courses around the world

settings.title: Do we offer Pre-Owned Equipment
settings.answer:
At times we will offer pre-owned or demo equipment. All equipment is inspected to ensure it is authentic.

Opinions on product condition vary. Please, refer to the pictures of the product for exact condition.

All pre-owned equipment will clearly be marked as “used” or “demo”

settings.title: How do I track my order status?
settings.answer: You will receive an email confirmation for purchase and another when it has shipped, which will include the tracking number

settings.title: Do you charge sales tax?
settings.answer: We only charge sales tax to Canadians, as required by the laws of each province

settings.title: Do you accept returns?
settings.answer: Yes, please refer to the Returns section for more information

settings.title: Donations
settings.answer: We already donate a significant portion of our sales to promote golf in Canada, so we do not offer any products or money for donations

settings.title: Do we accept Trade Ins
settings.answer: We do not currently offer any trade-in programs

settings.title: What do I do if there is a problem with my order?
settings.answer: Please, contact us at customerservice@golfvault.com. We will respond within 1 business day

settings.title: How long does it take to ship my order?
settings.answer: It will be shipped within 1 business day of purchase

settings.title: Do we provide custom fitting
settings.answer: We offer club fitting in our TrackMan Studio and we have fitting options from all top brands such as Titleist, Ping, Cobra, TaylorMade and more. Please, refer to Club Fittings page located under the Simulator drop down located in the top bar of the webpage.

We are proud to announce that Golf Vault is the Official Retail Partner of the this years Toronto Golf and Travel Show!

Join us Feb 3-5, 2023 at the International Centre (Hall 5) and kick off your golf season with great deals!
